TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MouseButtonEventHandler(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed MouseButtonEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub MouseButtonEventHandler(sender As Object, e As MouseButtonEventArgs)
public delegate void MouseButtonEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, MouseButtonEventArgs ^ e);
type MouseButtonEventHandler = delegate of obj * MouseButtonEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理与鼠标按钮相关的路由事件的方法，例如 。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle mouse button related routed events, for example .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用下列附加事件使用此委托。This delegate is used with the following attached events. - - - - - - 此委托用于以下路由事件。This delegate is used with the following routed events. 这些路由的事件将转发前面列出的附加的事件，以使其更方便地访问中的常规元素模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - - - - - 附加的事件和基元素路由事件共享其事件数据和浮升和隧道路由事件的版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 路由事件过程，这可能会影响事件的处理的特征。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建更改背景色的事件源的事件处理程序。The following example creates a event handler that changes the background color of the source of the event. 确定由哪个按钮被按下的背景色。The background color is determined by which button is pressed. [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsChangedButton](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouseeventargschangedbutton)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsChangedButton](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouseeventargschangedbutton)]
